Text:
Can it work on XP? It seems I can't  run it, even after I patch it it's not working...
PLEASE HELP!!!
I have installed, but the game is telling me to put the CD in to run the game....I could use a hint. Thx

That's the same problem i'm having
PLEASE HELP!!!
When tou look at the properies of the game, go in compatibility and choose win98 (it's an old game) and it will work under xp..

Does not work. Tried compatability mode on all options. Tried files from gamecopyworld.com.

Until someone posts a solution, I suggest you avoid this.
the game works great when you change compatiblity to win 98 in the properties but still the i cant see the menu or buttons while in-game have to click blindly for them anyhelp??

Theres a link to an unofficial patch, which should work with WinXP. 

http://www.axisandallies.org/forums/index.php?topic=9583.msg308221

However, I had no luck. If you succed, please post a guide here.

found a solution:
1. install new video drivers
2. disable directdraw hardware acceleration in dxdiag

enjoy!
I really want this game so seed if you can and aren't already. Thanks to the uploader for this game. Fingers crossed it works.
You may need Java to get this to work on XP or Vista/i7
Download the AAStarter Package from http://www.axisandallies.org/forums/index.php?topic=9583.msg308221 and then import the video and music files from the cd image from this torrent. ty for seeding.
